document_data.name: Nathdarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Nathdarr''' was a swordsmanship instructor of [[Waterdeep]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had only one eye, in [[Caladnei]]'s recollection.
document_data.Personality: He was seen as going very far to protect his students.
document_data.Activities: He taught swordplay at an upper room off [[Soothsayer's Way]].
document_data.History: Caladnei trained in swordplay under Nathdarr in her adventuring years; when she had to flee the city together with the rest of the [[Brightstar Sash]], her teacher was disappointed and disgusted at their behaviour, but she expected them to protect them from the mob that was chasing them away.
